books.Title: The Mushroom Cultivator: A Practical Guide to Growing Mushrooms at Home
books.Authors: Paul Stamets and J. S. Chilton
books.Note1: This is an exaustive guide to mushroom cultivation
books.Note2: I don't have the space in a one bedroom apartment to grow mushrooms so it's just a decoration

books.Title: The Origin of Birds
books.Note1: Gerhard Heilmann's diagrams of comparative anatomy convinced people that birds evolved from lizards and not dinosaurs
books.Note2: This book set back our understanding of birds by 50 years

books.Title: Moss Gardening: Including Lichens, Liverworts and Other Miniatures
books.Note1: This is the authoratative guide on growing moss
books.Note2: This isn't a book you bring up on a first date
